title: Corporate & Business Law
description: Comprehensive legal solutions for businesses from formation to dissolution, covering governance, contracts, compliance, and transactions.

title: Criminal Prosecution & Defense
description: Skilled representation for individuals and businesses in criminal investigations, trials, and appeals.

title: Family Law
description: Compassionate legal assistance in family and domestic matters, from marriage to child custody and protection.

title: Intellectual Property
description: Protecting and enforcing clients' rights over creative works, inventions, and brand assets.

title: Family & Business Governance & Succession
description: Helping family-owned businesses create governance structures, succession plans, and agreements that ensure sustainability.

title: Labor & Employment
description: Advising employers and employees on workplace policies, contracts, and labor disputes.

title: Real Estate & Land Titles
description: Legal services for property transactions, development, titling, and disputes.

title: Agrarian Law & Tenancy Issues
description: Guidance on agricultural land use, tenancy disputes, and related regulatory compliance.

title: Local Government, Election, & Administrative
description: Advising on matters involving local governance, elections, and administrative proceedings.

title: Alternative Dispute Resolution & Arbitration
description: Resolving conflicts efficiently outside of court through mediation, arbitration, and other ADR processes.
